heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_visage
heroes.bio_loc: Perched atop the entrance to the Narrow Maze sit the looming shapes of sneering gargoyles, the paths into the hereafter forever in their gaze.  Beasts and birds, men and monsters, all creatures that die and choose to travel beyond must someday pass beneath their sight.  For an untethered spirit, the decision to journey through the veil of death is irrevocable.  When chance comes, and by craft or cunning some restless soul escapes their hells and heavens, it is the dreaded gargoyle Visage, the bound form of the eternal spirit Necro'lic, who is dispatched to reclaim them.  Ruthless and efficient, unhindered by the principles of death and fatigue, Visage stalks its prey without mercy or end, willingly destroying all which may give shelter to the fugitive essence.  That which flaunts the laws of the afterlife may never rest, for while it is true that the dead may be revived, it is only a matter of time before Visage finds and returns them to their proper place.
heroes.hype_loc: As his deadly familiars scout the field, Visage cloaks himself in armor and seeks the next battle. Once near a skirmish, he gathers soul energy from damage inflicted upon nearby fighters before releasing it in a devastating attack.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Scouts and attacks with his familiars

abilities.name: visage_grave_chill
abilities.desc_loc: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself and nearby familiars.
abilities.lore_loc: The warmth of the sun is never felt in the dark cold of the Narrow Maze.
notes_loc: The two buffs can be removed separately by dispels.
The speed gained is independent of the speed lost on the target.
Familiars within %radius% range of Visage will also receive bonuses from Grave Chill.

abilities.name: visage_soul_assumption
abilities.desc_loc: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than %damage_limit% damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.
abilities.lore_loc: The collected souls of the dead reach out to bring another into their fold.
notes_loc: Charges are only gained for damage greater than %damage_min% and less than %damage_max% that is dealt by a player or Roshan.  Self-damage or Soul Assumption damage isn't counted.

abilities.name: visage_gravekeepers_cloak
abilities.desc_loc: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from damage.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.
abilities.lore_loc: Visage's tough scales share equal properties of ghost and stone, making it nearly impervious to blade and magical assault.
notes_loc: Each time Visage receives damage greater than the Minimum Damage that was not self-inflicted and was from a player owned source, a layer is removed.
Familiars within %radius% range of Visage will receive the current damage reduction from Gravekeeper's Cloak.
abilities.shard_loc: Grants Visage the ability to cast Gravekeeper's Cloak. Restores up to %shard_hp_restoration_pct%%% of your health.

abilities.name: visage_silent_as_the_grave
abilities.desc_loc: Turns Visage and familiars invisible, granting Visage bonus movement speed and upgrading its movement type to flying. When Visage or its familiars leave invisibility they deal more damage for a short duration. Lasts %invis_duration% seconds. Invisibility ends when attacking or casting.

abilities.name: visage_summon_familiars
abilities.desc_loc: Conjures blind Familiars to fight for Visage.  Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing.  While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health.  Familiars grant high bounty when killed.
abilities.lore_loc: Guardians of the Narrow Maze, Necro'lic's Familiars stand watch over his domain.
notes_loc: Casting Summon Familiars will replace any existing Familiars.
Familiars within range of Visage will receive bonuses from Gravekeeper's Cloak and Grave Chill.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_visage_3
talents.desc_loc: A second Soul Assumption is launched towards a random enemy unit within the cast range, prioritizing Heroes.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_visage_1
talents.name_loc: +{s:value} Armor Corruption to Visage and Familiars
talents.desc_loc: This effect can stack among multiple sources
